name: GusGear
description:
(Made for Wowie! Jam 4.0)                                                                                                                                  You are Gear, Gus's robot created to help him escape his terrible office job! His job has been Invested with Flyers, and he needs your help! using Your mouse and left-clicking, you help Gus by destroying fylers, and bringing bounce pads to him.

This game has a slight screen-shake effect. Although it's light it might make some players Uncomfortable.
